thread.title: SALLY BUDNICK. KING GEORGE TRAVEL
thread.title_full: Ski.com reviewed by SALLY BUDNICK. KING GEORGE TRAVEL

author: SALLY BUDNICK. KING GEORGE TRAVEL
title: SALLY BUDNICK. KING GEORGE TRAVEL
text: I have had the pleasure of working with Danielle Leffler once again this year making arrangements for my client's ski packages. She is the most patient, knowledgeable and responsive agent I have ever worked with! If everyone was as efficient as Danielle, my job as a Travel Agent would be a breeze! Thank you for hiring such competent people.
